questionsData.title: Lemon can be used for treating bee stings.
The properties of all kinds of matter are the same.
Generally, how much light is reflected depends on the kind of surface.
Bats can't see, they only see with ultrasonic sound.
A development is the end result of a rapid process.
questionsData.explain_answer: Development can happen slowly over time or quickly through rapid processes. Not all development requires speed.

questionsData.title: Space is the area where planets and the stars are.
"Calm down" is said when somebody passes the exams.
Valley and village are synonyms.
All mountains have peaks.
To be extremely tired is to be exhausted.
questionsData.explain_answer:
."Exhausted" is an adjective that means feeling very tired .

Ex : I'm exhausted after running that marathon.

Extremely means to a very great degree.

Ex : She was extremely tired

questionsData.title: Reservoir and castle are synonyms.
Pleasant dream is the opposite of nightmare.
Rush is to walk slowly in a regular way.
The monthly regular money as pay is salary.
To be confident is to trust yourself.
Fantastic and great are antonyms.
Raise and increase have different meaning.
Frozen peas are green in color.
Bow and stern are parts of furniture.
"Sailing in an uncontrolled way" means "drifting".
The text is mainly talking about
questionsData.article: Sea turtles are reptiles remarkably suited to life in sea. Their shape, large size, and (powerful 1) front flippers allow them to dive to great depths, and swim long distances. Although sea turtles can remain submerged for hours at a time while resting or sleeping, they typically surface several times each hour to breathe. In most sea turtles, the top shell is composed of many bones covered with horny scales. Unlike their terrestrial relatives, they cannot pull their heads into their shells. Most sea turtles grow slowly and have a lifespan of many decades. In summer reproduction begins when the female leaves the sea and crawls ashore to dig a nest in the sand, then deposits 80 to 150 eggs. The temperature of sea turtle nests determines the sex of the hatching. Warmer temperatures, produce more (female 2), whereas cooler temperatures result in more males. For this reason, wildlife managers leave turtle eggs in (their 3) original location whenever possible so that sex ratios are determined naturally.

questionsData.title: …….colder the winter, the heavier clothes we wear.
questionsData.explain_answer:
In the sentence ".......colder the winter, the heavier clothes we wear," the grammatically correct article to use is the. Here's why:

  • "The" is used when referring to specific things that are already known to the speaker and listener. In this case, both "winter" and "clothes" are general concepts that are likely familiar to both parties.

questionsData.title: …… is a compound word.
I dream to have a house. The word "dream" is a/an ……
The suffix …… changes the word "weak" into verb.
The closer the fire, the ……. we feel.
He is as…… as a horse.
Ahmed was born ……April 29th.
We visited the manager……mother died in an accident.
. . . . he was sick, he went to work.
The fence of our house is ……
Nurses ……..after patients in hospitals.
The thick fog is…… later this afternoon.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The verb to be + to + infinitive

Ex:

: The President is to meet the ambassador tomorrow.
The thick fog is to clear this afternoon.
You can use these structure to talk about future plans or forecasts. You often
see it in newspaper.

questionsData.title: The girl with the golden hair was….in the garden.
While he …….. a lorry , he hit an old man.
questionsData.explain_answer: The structure "while + past continuous" is often used in combination with the past simple tense to express two  actions in the past.

questionsData.title: Fields are being …… today.
My son has ..... his father's car since 2020.
I watched the cats …..the fish.
Sara wishes that she …… a black car.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Sara wishes that she had a black car.

  • "Having" is the present participle and wouldn't be used to express a wish about something she doesn't currently have.
  • "Have" is the present tense and wouldn't be used to express a wish either.
  • "Had" is the past tense of "have" and is used to express a desire for something that isn't currently true. This makes it the most fitting choice for a wish about a car she doesn't own.
  • "Has-" is just the beginning of the verb and wouldn't be used on its own in this sentence.

Therefore, The best choice to complete the sentence had .

questionsData.title: She admitted the guilt …….
Ask the waiter . . . . tea for me.
